org.openscience.cdk.interfaces
Interface IFragmentAtom

All Superinterfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, IAtom, IAtomType, IChemObject, IElement, IIsotope, IPseudoAtom
All Known Implementing Classes:
DebugFragmentAtom, FragmentAtom, NNFragmentAtom
public interface IFragmentAtom
extends IPseudoAtom

Class to represent an IPseudoAtom which embeds an IAtomContainer. Very much like the MDL molfile Group concept.

Author:
egonw
Belongs to CDK module:
interfaces
Source code:
HEAD
